account_types.label: Savings Account
account_types.description: A savings account is a deposit account held at a bank or other financial institution that provides a modest interest rate.

account_types.label: Checking Account
account_types.description: A checking account is a deposit account that allows for withdrawals and deposits, typically used for daily transactions.

account_types.label: Credit Account
account_types.description: A credit account allows the account holder to borrow funds up to a certain limit for purchases or cash advances.

account_types.label: Investment Account
account_types.description: An investment account is used to hold securities such as stocks, bonds, and mutual funds, allowing for growth of capital over time.
